lead_paragraph: Indonesia has pulled out of a Fed Cup meeting with Israel in Tel Aviv because of Israel's military offensive in the Gaza Strip, Indonesia's foreign ministry said yesterday. The countries, which do not have diplomatic relations, were to meet in a World Group II playoff on July 15-16.
